name: Zheng He's Voyages
description: Zheng He's Voyages is a game all about exploring for China and trading just like Zheng He what did. Your goal is to discover and trade for all 22 items in the game while also balancing the restriction of only being able to restock on resources 7 times before the end of the game. This restriction is based of off the true story of Zheng He, because his adventuring was cut short after 7 voyages.
